On Fri, Apr 23, 2010 at 7:19 PM, R Fritz <randolph+LD at panix.com> wrote:
> Has anyone else tried this on Mac OS? It doesn't work for me--is it working

Yes, here! OS X 10.6, Python 2.6 from the system.


One tip: start with -d command line option and watch the messages scroll by.


Cheers,
Thomas
